flawed_nl_solution:
Randy has 30-10=<<30-10=40>>40 dollars left after buying lunch.
Randy spent 40/4=<<40/4=10.0>>10.0 dollars on the ice cream cone.
Randy has 40-10.0=<<40-10.0=30.0>>30.0 dollars left.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 20, not 40. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
